name: Proof 363 — Replanting Tomatoes from Excess Household Consumption
description:
This proof documents a gardening activity at MaMeeFarm on 20 December 2025 at 10:50 (GMT+7).

The image shows MaMee manually planting tomato seedlings in the garden. These tomatoes originate from household consumption where the harvest exceeded immediate needs, and viable seeds or seedlings were returned to the soil instead of being discarded.

This activity reflects a closed-loop, small-scale farming practice where food, seeds, and labor remain connected within the same land system. The task is performed manually using simple tools, under natural daylight conditions, without mechanization or chemical input.

The record is captured as-is, with a visible timestamp embedded in the image, ensuring temporal traceability and continuity within the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection.
